headline.main: Deutsche Bank Sees Postbank Re-Integration Taking 3-5 Years
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Sees Postbank Re-Integration Taking 3-5 Years

lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank expects the re-integration of its Postbank unit to take three to five years, its chief executive said after Germany's top lender announced plans for an 8 billion euro ($8.5 billion) rights issue and a structural shake-up.
snippet: Deutsche Bank expects the re-integration of its Postbank unit to take three to five years, its chief executive said after Germany's top lender announced plans for an 8 billion euro ($8.5 billion) rights issue and a structural shake-up....
